document.topic_text: 索非布韦 中间体 (http://www.chemdrug.com/sell/19/) 1武汉生产 厂家 (http://www.chemdrug.com/company/) 中文名称：PSI 6206中间体 中文别名：PSI 6206中间体；索氟布韦中间体 SF-3；(2'R)-N-苯甲酰基-2'-脱氧-2'-氟-2'-甲基胞苷 3',5'-二苯甲酸酯； 呋喃核糖基嘧啶核苷； 英文名称：PSI-6130 derivative 英文别名：Cytidine, N-benzoyl-2'-deoxy-2'-fluoro-2'-Methyl-, 3',5'-dibenzoate, (2'R)-；PSI-6130 derivative；2'-Deoxy-2'-fluoro-2'- Methyl-N-(phenylcarbonyl) cytidine；(2'R)-N-Benzoyl-2'-deoxy-2'-fluoro-2'-Methylcytidine 3',5'-dibenzoate；3',5'-O-4-Tribenzoyl-2'-deoxy-2'-fluoro-2'-C-Methylcytidine；(2R,3R,4R,5R)-5-(4-benzaMido-2-oxopyriMidin-1(2H)-yl)-2-((benzoyloxy)Methyl)-4-fluoro-4-Methyltetrahydrofuran-3-yl benzoate；(2R,3R,4R,5R)-5-(4-benzaMido-2-oxopyriMidin-1(2H)-yl)；InterMediate of Sofosbuir CAS号：817204-32-3
